attributes.action: Return the UK to a Monarchy to take control of the Government.
attributes.background: The public have been subjected to incompetency from current MPs over Brexit. The Monarchy genuinely have the best interests of the UK in their hearts. Leaving the country in or out of the EU in the hands of current MPs will be of detriment to our future as a Nation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the powers you would like to be given to the Monarch.
